HTMLLIElementValue.summary: The value property of the interface indicates the ordinal position of the list element inside a given ol. It can be smaller than 0. If the li element is not a child of an ol element, the property has no meaning.

remarks.para: It reflects the value attribute of the corresponding li element. If the <li> element does not have a value content attribute specified, then this property returns 0 by default even when the element may have a default serially-assigned ordinal value when rendered.
